data.title: China orders North Korean firms to close down within 120 days
Rapper Pitbull sends his private plane to rescue Puerto Rican cancer patients

Wellness blogger fined for fake cancer tale - An Australian wellness blogger who falsely claimed to have cancer has been fined £240,000, $322,000 for misleading her readers. Belle Gibson, 25, gained fame in Australia after she claimed to have beaten brain cancer using natural remedies and nutrition.
